results.content: This course is like a badly constructed introduction video about a given topic. The instructor just moves back and forth between the browser and the code editor, goes through the VueJS documentation and does what he thinks you need to know. There is no structure whatsoever, no projects that have a beginning, a middle and an end. It also uses the old V1 version of VueJS and the current (06/2021) version is V3. Jump cuts are enforced to cover the instructor's lack of planning and there a few instances where he jumps from between windows many times in a row just because he made a typo or forgot to wrote some important part of the code that is needed so that the front-end can work properly.

response.content: Over the past 5 days, you've left me the exact same rating on, now over 7 of my courses.  Please note that the title of the course indicates the version of VUE that will be covered.
response.content_html: Over the past 5 days, you've left me the exact same rating on, now over 7 of my courses. Please note that the title of the course indicates the version of VUE that will be covered.

results.content:
Decent course. Much of it was straight from the Vue.js docs though, including copying/pasting from them at times. 

The instructor seems to be knowledgeable but also seems to be doing things on the fly at times. A little more preparedness and better real-world examples would have made the course a lot better.

If you learn better by watching and listening this is a good companion to the official Vue docs but don't expect it to cover as much (or go as in depth) as the docs themselves. A decent introduction though, especially if you can grab it on sale.

response.content: This is an introduction course and designed to introduce users to Vuejs who may not have used it before.  The course is well planned out with introduction of concepts step by step.
response.content_html: This is an introduction course and designed to introduce users to Vuejs who may not have used it before. The course is well planned out with introduction of concepts step by step.
